guest_sub: Practical details, Wi-Fi, arrival info, and local tips for your stay.
footer_note: We look forward to hosting you — enjoy your stay!
parking: There are three private parking spaces in front of each apartment, all available and reserved for you.
lock: The apartments have a secure digital lock with a PIN. Before arrival, we will send you the PIN via WhatsApp, SMS, or email.

wifi.text: The Wi-Fi network name is AuraAdriatica_Guest and the password is AuraA20&24!. You can also scan the QR code to connect automatically.

registration: Following Croatian law, all guests must be registered. To speed up check-in, please fill in details for each guest: https://mvisitor.hr/prijava/?q=6c46ee3d-4b4b-47b9-9151-ee974015d43c
waste: Two waste bins are available: one for mixed waste and one for plastic. These bins are located in the parking lot. To access the mixed waste bin, you will need a key. In the Onyx apartment, the key is on the shelf to the right of the entrance door. In the Olive apartment, the key is in the rightmost drawer of the kitchen island, attached to a keychain labeled 'Lovran'.
restaurants: Draga di Lovrana, Lovranska Draga — https://maps.app.goo.gl/KRJHHeXPYkrMxbwn6
